args.document: Use the following toggles to determine what is included when this deal is sent to the agent / cast member.

args.help_text: As a Loan Out, we require a signature on your contract from a representative of the lender company. If you are authorised to sign on behalf of the lender, then set your answer to 'No'.

args.template: PLEASE NOTE: You only need to fill in this section if you are NOT authorised to sign as both lender and individual.

args.template: £{{ ((((deal_memo.meta.get('number_engagement_fees', decimal.Decimal('0')) + deal_memo.meta.get('additional_multi_episodic', decimal.Decimal('0'))) * deal_memo.meta.get('engagement_fee', decimal.Decimal('0')) + (deal_memo.meta.get('production_day_payments', decimal.Decimal('0')) * decimal.Decimal("61.50")) + (((deal_memo.meta.get('number_engagement_fees', decimal.Decimal('0')) + deal_memo.meta.get('additional_multi_episodic', decimal.Decimal('0'))) * deal_memo.meta.get('engagement_fee', decimal.Decimal('0')) + (deal_memo.meta.get('production_day_payments', decimal.Decimal('0'))) * decimal.Decimal("61.50")) * decimal.Decimal("0.35"))) + (((deal_memo.meta.get('number_engagement_fees', decimal.Decimal('0')) + deal_memo.meta.get('additional_multi_episodic', decimal.Decimal('0'))) * deal_memo.meta.get('engagement_fee', decimal.Decimal('0')) + (deal_memo.meta.get('production_day_payments', decimal.Decimal('0'))) * decimal.Decimal("61.50")) * decimal.Decimal("0.53"))) + (deal_memo.calculators.cast.rehearsal_fee(deal_memo) + (deal_memo.meta.get('cast_self_isolation_weeks_fee', decimal.Decimal("0")) * deal_memo.meta.get('cast_self_isolation_weeks', decimal.Decimal("0"))) + deal_memo.meta.get('additional_nominal_sum', decimal.Decimal('0')))).quantize(decimal.Decimal(".01")) }}
